data.fullContent: Rapper Kanye West's first album The College Dropout was released in 2004. It entered the American album chart at number two. It has sold over four million copies around the world. Since then West has released five more albums on his own and one with Jay-Z in 2011. All of the albums have reached number one.
data.answer: 饶舌歌手坎耶·韦斯特的第一张专辑《The College Dropout》于2004年发行。它在美国专辑排行榜上排名第二。它已经在全世界售出了400多万册。自那以后，韦斯特又发行了五张专辑，其中一张是2011年与Jay-Z合作的。所有的专辑都达到了第一名。
